name: Feeding Frenzy: Blood in the Water
name_original: Feeding Frenzy: Blood in the Water
description:
Play as a Shark Blood Mage and fight creatures of the deep! Use your Blood Arrows to mark enemies and take a bite at them with your powerful CHOMP Attack.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:

Arrow Keys- Move

Space Bar- Jump

Z Key- CHOMP Attack

X Key- Blood Arrows (Use the Arrow keys to line up your shot)

*Once an enemy has been marked by a blood arrow, CHOMP Attack will home in within range!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Frank Deaton
